Package net.roydesign.ui

Class Summary
AbstractScreenAction A subclass of javax.swing.AbstractAction that adds the logistics needed to make menu bars conform to the Mac OS screen menu bar requirements without sacrificing the usual way of presenting menu bars on other platforms.
ApplicationDialog An application dialog is a modal file dialog to specifically select an application on disk.
FolderDialog A folder dialog is a modal file dialog to specically select a folder on disk.
JScreenMenu A subclass of javax.swing.JMenu that adds the logistics needed to make menu bars conform to the Mac OS screen menu bar requirements without sacrificing the usual way of presenting menu bars on other platforms.
JScreenMenuBar A subclass of javax.swing.JMenuBar that adds the logistics needed to make menu bars conform to the Mac OS screen menu bar requirements without sacrificing the usual way of presenting menu bars on other platforms.
JScreenMenuItem A subclass of javax.swing.JMenuItem that adds the logistics needed to make menu bars conform to the Mac OS screen menu bar requirements without sacrificing the usual way of presenting menu bars on other platforms.
ScreenMenu A subclass of Menu that adds the logistics needed to make menu bars conform to the Mac OS screen menu bar requirements without sacrificing the usual way of presenting menu bars on other platforms.
ScreenMenuBar A subclass of java.awt.MenuBar that adds the logistics needed to make menu bars conform to the Mac OS screen menu bar requirements without sacrificing the usual way of presenting menu bars on other platforms.
ScreenMenuItem A subclass of java.awt.MenuItem that adds the logistics needed to make menu bars conform to the Mac OS screen menu bar requirements without sacrificing the usual way of presenting menu bars on other platforms.
StandardMacAboutFrame Java and cross-platform implementation of an About box similar to the standard About panel built into the Cocoa framework on Mac OS X.
